author: Kate Riley
excerpt: It’s December! Time to decorate and spread holiday cheer! I’m finishing up two craft projects by twilight and hope to photograph them this week. We pick up ...
text: It’s December! Time to decorate and spread holiday cheer! I’m finishing up two craft projects by twilight and hope to photograph them this week. We pick up our tree next weekend and Saturday will be all about trimming the tree and hanging garland up the stairs. Christmas is three weeks away! I have most of my holiday shopping done which is a relief. Just filling in a few blanks with smaller token items before calling it done. We have two holiday parties to attend. For one I’m wearing this comfortable yet festive dress in plum. For the other I’m not sure, I’m thinking something a little sparkly but more casual like this top. Favorite links from the week: All the dark wood and traditional details in this historic home. This color drenched West Palm beach abode. Wallpaper inspiration for your powder room. Why nostalgia is a factor when you decorate. The Southern Living Idea House dressed up for Christmas. Do you think white molding and baseboards are outdated? This idea poses a new alternative. 30 ways to decorate your doors during the holidays. It amazes me how many tiny homes you can buy on Amazon! Christmas tree ideas for small spaces. And the winner of the National Dog Show is…… Thinking about a trip Italy next year ? Here are 100 things to consider experiencing. Igloos around the world for seeing the northern lights.
html:
It’s December! Time to decorate and spread holiday cheer! I’m finishing up two craft projects by twilight and hope to photograph them this week. We pick up our tree next weekend and Saturday will be all about trimming the tree and hanging garland up the stairs. Christmas is three weeks away!

I have most of my holiday shopping done which is a relief. Just filling in a few blanks with smaller token items before calling it done. We have two holiday parties to attend. For one I’m wearing this comfortable yet festive dress in plum. For the other I’m not sure, I’m thinking something a little sparkly but more casual like this top.

Favorite links from the week:

All the dark wood and traditional details in this historic home.

This color drenched West Palm beach abode.

Wallpaper inspiration for your powder room.

Why nostalgia is a factor when you decorate.

The Southern Living Idea House dressed up for Christmas.

Do you think white molding and baseboards are outdated? This idea poses a new alternative.

30 ways to decorate your doors during the holidays.

It amazes me how many tiny homes you can buy on Amazon!

Christmas tree ideas for small spaces.

And the winner of the National Dog Show is……

Thinking about a trip Italy next year ? Here are 100 things to consider experiencing.

Igloos around the world for seeing the northern lights.
